snippet: It was the third time in just over two weeks that a man wearing an Afghan Army uniform attacked NATO personnel.
abstract: Afghan soldier turns his gun on American military personnel while they are playing volleyball at a camp in southern Afghanistan, killing one and wounding three others before being fatally shot; shooting is third time in just over two weeks that a man wearing an Afghan Army uniform has attacked NATO personnel.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: It was the third time in just over two weeks that a man wearing an Afghan Army uniform attacked NATO personnel.

headline.seo: Afghan Soldier Kills an American and Wounds 3 Others
headline.main: Afghan Soldier Shoots Americans, Killing One
headline.print_headline: Afghan Soldier Shoots Americans, Killing One
